title: Kylie Jenner swigs tequila from bottle on wild night with Sofia Richie
text:
Kylie Jenner goes wild (Pictures: @kyliejenner/Instagram)

Kylie Jenner had a wild night with her bestie Sofia Richie and something tells us she probably woke up with the mother of all hangovers this morning.

The 22-year-old reality TV star took to Instagram to share a series of videos of her partying alongside some seriously high profile friends backstage at J Balvin’s Staples Center, Los Angeles show on Saturday night.

In one video, Kylie watches on as Sofia takes a huge sip of tequila from the bottle.

She then hands her pal a Red Bull chaser to wash it all down, while she takes a gulp of the hard liquor too.

Girls gone wild (Picture: Instagram / @kyliejenner)

The Instagram story progresses to Kylie hanging out with singer Will.I.Am, where she asks to try on his super cool specs.

‘Woah! These are crazy,’ Kylie remarked. ‘Can I have these?’

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I can get you some,’ the former Black Eyed Peas band member replied.

The next video is of Kylie discovering the glasses actually light up and she marvelled: ‘They glow! He didn’t even tell me that they glow.’

Kylie hangs out with Will.I.Am (Picture: @kyliejenner/Instagram)

Kylie Jenner tries on Will.I.Am’s specs (Picture: Instagram / @kyliejenner)

And then came the most bizarre little photo shoot with the young mother finding a shower and turning it on, while wearing a leather dress.

Sofia recorded the video as she commented: ‘Scrub-a-dub-dub’ and Kylie turned on the water. ‘Omg what a freak,’ she remarked.

Kylie quickly turned it off and waved at her bestie to stop recording. But not before taking a series of photos and posting them to her Instagram page.

Rocking a Christian Cowan gown and Balenciaga heels, she captioned the photo: ‘showering you with loooooooks’, alongside black hearts and shower head emojis.

Kylie later uploaded some videos of her dancing in the crowd of the concert with Yris Palmer, Sofia and Corey Gamble.

What a wild night.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

MORE: Oritse Williams’ new music will ‘tell quite the story’ as he opens up following rape accusation
description: Kylie Jenner was swigging tequila and chasing it with Red Bull during a wild night of partying with bestie Sofia Richie.
